TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HealthVaultPlatformApplication extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides low-level access to the HealthVault message operations.
Docs.remarks: uses this class to perform operations. Set HealthVaultPlatformApplication.Current to a derived class to intercept all message calls.

Docs.param: The connection to use to perform the operation. This connection must be application level.

A boolean value indicating whether the localized values all languages should be returned, just one language. This affects all properties which can have multiple localized values, including , , , , , , , and
Docs.summary: Gets the application configuration information for the calling application.
Docs.returns: An ApplicationInfo object for the calling application.
Docs.remarks: This method always calls the HealthVault service to get the latest information. It returns installation configuration about the calling application.
Docs.exception: The HealthVault service returned an error.

Docs.param: The connection to use to perform the operation. This connection must be application-level.
The object used to configure the IEnumerable iterator returned by this method.
Docs.summary: Gets information about people authorized for an application.
Docs.returns: An IEnumerable iterator of objects representing people authorized for the application.
Docs.remarks: The returned IEnumerable iterator will access the HealthVault service across the network. See for applicable settings.
Docs.exception: The HealthVault service returned an error. The retrieval can be retried from the current position by calling this method again and using the last successfully retrieved person Id for .
